title: Fix CoreIndependentInputSource
body: According to the documentation the proper way to handle input in a store app is to create a CoreIndependentInputSource from another thread by calling swapChainPanel.CreateCoreIndependentInputSource(). This gives you low latency input in case of a busy UI thread.
